H0.text: who rebuilt the temple after the babylonian captivity. Zerubbabel

H1.text: who rebuilt the temple after the babylonian captivity. Ezra

H2.text: who rebuilt the temple after the babylonian captivity. Nehemiah

H3.text: who rebuilt the temple after the babylonian captivity. Herod

A4.text: Zerubbabel led the first group of Jews, numbering 42,360, who returned from the Babylonian captivity in the first year of Cyrus the Great, the king of the Achaemenid Empire.

A5.text: The mention of Zerubbabel in the book of Ezra primarily serves the purpose of describing the return to Judah following the exile from Babylon and the construction of the Second Temple.
